contentrichtext.text: '''Hatti''' may refer to *Hatti (Assyrian {{transl|akk|<sup>URU</sup>''Ha-at-ti''}}) in Bronze Age Anatolia: **the area of [[Hattusa]], roughly delimited by the Halys bend **the [[Hattians]] of the 3rd and 2nd millennia BC **the [[Hittite Empire]] of ''ca'' 1400 BC–1200 BC **the areas to the west of the Euphrates controlled by [[Neo-Hittite]] kingdoms (1000-700 BC) ==Places== *[[Hatti, Raichur]], a settlement in the Raichur district of Karnataka, India *[[Hatti, Davanagere]], a settlement in the [[Davanagere district]] of Karnataka, India *[[Hatti District]], an administrative subdivision of Iran ==See also== *[[Hattie (disambiguation)]] {{disambig|geo}}
